comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

While on weightwatchers.com I tried to click on track my points I received the following error in a box for Java:

Error loading preferences. TypeError: this.prefs.getBoolPref is not a function

After closing out the error box the next screen that I wanted did appear.

Reproducible: Always
comments.author: md_leslie@yahoo.com
comments.creator: md_leslie@yahoo.com
